keywords_model.teleportation: This model's unit can perform the "Setup teleportation" and "Recall" actions.
keywords_model.stealth: If this model's unit is near cover, it can only be selected as a target unit by units within 20 cm.
keywords_model.large: This unit is never considered to be in cover, cannot perform the "Brace" action, and units cannot attach to this unit.
keywords_model.fly: This model can perform the "Fly" action up to the given distance.
keywords_model.move: This model can perform the "Move" action up to the given distance.
keywords_model.score:
This model's unit can perform the "Score objective" action.
Furthermore, this unit can be attached to another friendly unit at deployment. While this unit is attached to another unit, it cannot be selected as a target unit.

keywords_weapon.heavy: Can only use this weapon when performing the "Heavy attack" action.
